p:
Genotyping of chimpanzee DNA from fecal samples showed all 41 animals to be homozygous for the CDHR3-Y 529 allele, which is associated with increased susceptibility to rhinovirus C and wheezing illness in humans (
7 ). Similarly, all 24 chimpanzee genomes from the Great Ape Genome Project (
25 ) were homozygous for the CDHR3-Y 529 allele.
